altTitles.en: やっぱり脱いじゃダメ!

description.en:
This ia collection of short stories/one shots.  
  
- Yappari Nui ja Dame!  
  
Yui's boyfriend Sota invites her on a 2 day 1 day stay at a hot-springs inn. Sota looks and act like a sheep when he's around people but when they're alone he's like a wolf. Her friends gave her alot (10) condoms for that trip and she was embarrassed and don't want Sota to find out. And so the trip begins…   
  
- Dekiaki Love Virgin  
  
Shiramine Konatsu is still a virgin and haven't gone on a date before. She couldn't say out loud cause she think her classmate would laugh. What doesn't help is that they think she been on a lot of date and isn't a virgin. They see her as a pretty girl who's good at makeup. Due to her appearance they think she's a playgirl. She has a crush on her classmate Suzushi Asano but because of what everyone else think of her she doesn't have the courage to confess so instead she drops hint but he don't seen to pick it up. When he was talking with his friends she overheard he like girls with experiences…  
  
- Rakuen Drops  
Mizuka wins Estorado. Before she can get on the plane her friend cancels and she finds out she must go on the trip alone. She meets Maya a boy with exotic eyes and he invites her to his villa…   
  
- Chura Koiiro  
A cute story about a boy who follows a girl to Okinawa from Tokyo after she moved there 2 years and a half ago. During that time, he has aquired a talent for taking photos. He wants to go to college in Okinawa if she says yes to "going out" with him. But she gets a phone call from his father.
